com.here.android.mpa.routing

Class Signpost

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.routing.Signpost

  • public final class Signpost
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores signpost information along the Route.
    See Also:
    Maneuver

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Signpost.LocalizedLabel
      Signpost information can be used for navigation (both audible and graphical/textual navigation) and map display.

    • Method Detail

      • getForegroundColor

        public int getForegroundColor()
        Return the foreground/text color of this signpost using ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue)
        Returns:
        The foreground/text color of this signpost
        See Also:
        argbColor The ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from 0..255 with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution

      • getBackgroundColor

        public int getBackgroundColor()
        Return the background color of this signpost using ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue)
        Returns:
        The background color of this signpost
        See Also:
        argbColor The ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from 0..255 with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution
